price: Wakasema: Mpe muda yeye na nduguye na uwatume mijini wapigao mbiu ya mgambo.
arabic: قَالُوٓاْ أَرۡجِهۡ وَأَخَاهُ وَٱبۡعَثۡ فِي ٱلۡمَدَآئِنِ حَٰشِرِينَ
footnotes: Watu wake wakamwambia: Akhirisha kukata shauri yao hawa, na uwatume askari wende wawakusanye wachawi katika raia zako. Kwani uchawi hupingwa kwa uchawi.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: qālū arjih wa-akhāhu wa-ib'ʿath fī al-madāini ḥāshirīna
